tika-vin09t11:1_0: Dutiye idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvaraṁ nissaggiyaṁ hoti, taṁ vinayakammaṁ katvāpi attanā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t11:2_0: Tatiye “samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṁ pana dukkhavedana”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t11:3_0: Catutthe paṭhamaṁ viññattaṁ alabhitvā aññaṁ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
